mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OCC_YM, 'YYYYMM'), 'YYYY.MM') AS month, M.RSV_CHG AS totalAmount, ROUND(M.RSV_CHG / A.UNIT_TOT) AS amount FROM MGMT_ALL_INFO M JOIN APT_INFO A ON M.CMPX_CD = A.CMPX_CD WHERE M.CMPX_CD = #{cmpxCd} AND TO_DATE(OCC_YM, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY OCC_YM
